person.persName: Thomas Morgan Wallis (Fayette County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Fayette County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Susan Wallis. Father of Maria L. Wallis, James W. Wallis, Susan Ann Wallis, Thomas W. Wallis, Oliver Wallis, Elizabeth Wallis, Eldred D. Wallis, Robert Wallis, and Mary Wallis. Farmer in Fayette County in 1850. Owned twenty-three enslaved persons in Fayette County in 1850. Farmer in Fayette County in 1860. Owned twenty-nine enslaved persons in Fayette County in 1860.
